<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2304</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The movement of spinning bodies on a surface</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Bewegung der spinnenden Körper auf einer 
Oberfläche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mouvement des corps de rotation sur une surface</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O movimento de corpos girando em uma superfície</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il movimento dei corpi di filatura su una 
superficie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μετακίνηση της περιστροφής των οργανισμών σε μια 
επιφάνεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El movimiento de cuerpos que hacen girar en una 
superficie</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which examines the forces acting (friction) on spinning bodies on different surfaces.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die fungierenden Kräfte 
(Friktion) auf spinnenden Körpern auf unterschiedlichen Oberflächen 
überprüft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui examine les forces agissant 
(frottement) sur les corps de rotation sur différentes surfaces.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que examine as forças que agem 
(fricção) em corpos girando em superfícies diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che esamina le forze che si 
comportano (attrito) sui corpi di filatura sulle superfici differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που εξετάζει τις δυνάμεις ενεργώντας 
(τριβή) στην περιστροφή των οργανισμών στις διαφορετικές 
επιφάνειες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que examina las fuerzas que actúan 
(fricción) en cuerpos que hacen girar en diversas superficies.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
